name: osh-development-suite
description: OSH Hotels Management System - Development Environment

scripts.osh:restart: npm run osh:stop && timeout /t 2 >nul && npm run osh:start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../hotel-app && npm install && cd ../pms && npm install && cd ../automacao && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd hotel-app && npm run build && cd ../pms && npm run build && cd ../automacao && npm run build

author: OSH Development Team
